lines.text:
[to Lucy]
Now it is you, my best beloved one. You will be flesh of my flesh, blood of my blood. You will cross land and sea to do my bidding. I need your blood. I need...
Count, some wine?
No thank you, Doctor. I never drink wine.
COUNT DRACULA!
You needn't shout, Mr. Harker. You frightened me.
I'm sorry. I had a key.
[holds key up]
I had to let myself in.
I wonder where Renfield can be.
I don't know. I knocked but he didn't...

[interrupts]
Yes, well, the man is worthless.
Listen to them - the children of the night. What sad music they make!
You are a wise man, Professor, for someone who has not yet lived even a single lifetime.
You flatter me, Count.
But not wise enough to return to your native Holland, immediately.
I prefer to remain.
Please master. Hurt me, torture me, I deserve it. But please... don't kill me.
Ah, Renfield... you disappoint me so.
[talking about Dracula]
You dare try to confuse me! Tormenting him who is the saddest, the kindest of all!"
Kind? If I could send his soul to everlasting, burning hell I would!
Jonathan Harker tells me you speak some Romanian.
Well, hardly, I know...
[Dracula says a sentence in Romanian and Lucy smiles]
There, you do understand.

[still smiling]
Not really. I have no idea what you said.
I said it would be nice to see you smile.

[pause]
Then you should be pleased.
Oh, I am.
Before you arrived we were looking at the ship's log.
It wasn't lost at sea?
No. The very last entry was a strange word. A word that Mina thought meant "undead".
Undead?
Yes. "Nosferatu".
Ah! It means "not dead".
[Dracula, Lucy,and Mina are discussing "Nosferatu"]
Dead! Undead! I don't care, they all frighten me!
Oh, I love to be frightened!

[glances at her, then, after a pause]
*Do* you?
Lucy, come! Come to me!
[Lucy runs into Dracula's arms, and he embraces her]
No, you must go on a bit longer as a creature of the sun. Only until we have left behind those who would destroy us.
And then?
Then you will join me on a higher plane... feeding on them. We will create more of our kind, Lucy.

[looking at himself in a mirror]
Ach, the devil.
Come now, professor... not as bad as that.

You fools! Do you think with your crosses and your wafers you can destroy me? Me! You do not know how many men have come against me. I am the *king* of my kind! You have accomplished nothing, Van Helsing. Time is on my side. In a century, when you are dust, I shall wake and call Lucy, my queen, from her grave. I have in my time had many brides, Mr. Harker. But I shall set Lucy above them all.
You won't get Lucy!
She's mine already.
I too have buried many friends, and I am weary.
In the past 500 years, Professor, those who have crossed my path have all died, and some not pleasantly.
I've been bitten by a bat.

[sarcastically]
Yes, I know.
I am the *king* of my kind!
[Dr.Seward is sending a message to Van Helsing over the phone]
Mina has died... No not *lied*! *Died*!
